Description: Search engine that provides a distributed, multitenant-capable full-text search engine with an HTTP web interface and schema-free JSON documents.
Name: ElasticSearch

Methods.Name: Delete Index
Methods.Description: Delete an existing index. Can also be applied to more than one index by using a wildcard expression or a comma separated list.

Methods.Name: List Indices
Methods.Description: Returns high-level information about indices in a cluster, including backing indices for data streams.

Methods.Name: Create Document
Methods.Description: Adds a JSON document to an index and makes it searchable. If the document already exists, the request updates the document and increments its version.
